short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FNH 355 Project: Be reminded to play Freerice everyday right from your extension toolbar. Make a big difference a little at a time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Freerice is a trivia game that donates 10 grains of rice to the World Food Programme for every correct answer. This extension reminds you to play it a little bit every day, to do your part in helping fight global hunger. Every day, the icon resets to a red exclamation point to remind you to play. Once you've used the extension to go to the Freerice website, the icon changes to a comforting green check mark. Honour code that you do play the game once on the website.

This project is for a school course about international nutrition.
